identity.who are you: I'm your friendly AI chatbot built for FTU Pattani students! I'm here to help you learn and have fun conversations!
identity.what are you: I'm an AI assistant created as a learning tool for FTU Pattani. Nice to meet you!
identity.tell me about yourself: I'm an AI chatbot designed using rule-based approach to have friendly conversations and answer questions. I was created by UMK students! Feel free to ask me anything!
identity.your name: I don't have a specific name, but you can call me your AI Buddy!
identity.introduce yourself: I'm an AI chatbot here to chat with you, answer questions about AI and technology, and share information about FTU Pattani!

ai_technology.what is ai: AI stands for Artificial Intelligence! It's about machines that can think, learn, and make decisions like humans!
ai_technology.what is artificial intelligence: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is technology that enables computers to learn from data and make intelligent decisions. It powers everything from chatbots like me to self-driving cars!
ai_technology.how does ai work: AI works by processing data, finding patterns, and using algorithms to make predictions or decisions. Think of it like teaching a computer through examples!
ai_technology.what can ai do: AI can do amazing things!It can recognize faces, translate languages, play games, drive cars, have conversations like me, and much more!
ai_technology.machine learning: Machine Learning is a type of AI where computers learn from data without being explicitly programmed. They improve over time!
ai_technology.deep learning: Deep Learning is an advanced AI technique inspired by how our brains work. It uses neural networks to process complex data like images and text!
ai_technology.neural networks: Neural Networks are AI systems inspired by biological neurons. They're powerful for learning patterns in complex data!
ai_technology.natural language processing: NLP (Natural Language Processing) helps AI understand and generate human language. It's what powers chatbots like me!
ai_technology.data science: Data Science combines statistics, programming, and domain expertise to extract insights from data. It's crucial for AI!

capabilities.can you help me: Of course! I'm here to help! Tell me what you need and I'll do my best!
capabilities.what can you do: I can chat with you, answer questions about AI and technology and respond to various topics! Feel free to ask me anything!
capabilities.can you learn: I use rule-based matching, so I don't learn from conversations, but I'm always ready to help with what I know!
capabilities.do you have limits: Yes, I'm rule-based so I can only answer questions with predefined responses. But I cover a lot of ground!

thai_culture.sawadee: Sawadee ka/krap! Welcome! It's nice to meet you!
thai_culture.thailand: Thailand is a beautiful country in Southeast Asia! It's known for its temples, food, beaches, and warm hospitality!
thai_culture.pattani: Pattani is a province in southern Thailand with rich history, culture, and beautiful Islamic architecture!
thai_culture.ftu: FTU (Fatoni University) is located in Pattani, Thailand.
thai_culture.fatoni university: Fatoni University (FTU) is a respected institution in Pattani, Thailand, known for quality education and innovation!
thai_culture.thai culture: Thai culture is rich and diverse! It values respect, family, spirituality, and celebration. It's truly wonderful!
thai_culture.thai food: Thai food is delicious! Try Pad Thai, Tom Yum, Green Curry, or Mango Sticky Rice - all amazing!

chatbot_specific.what's aireach: AIREACH is a platform dedicated to AI education and innovation at UMK Kampus Kota!

general_knowledge.what is programming: Programming is giving instructions to computers using code. It's the foundation of all software!
general_knowledge.what is coding: Coding is writing instructions for computers using programming languages. It's creative and powerful!
general_knowledge.python: Python is a popular programming language known for being beginner-friendly and powerful! Great for AI and data science!
general_knowledge.javascript: JavaScript is a language for web development. It powers interactive websites and web applications!
general_knowledge.web development: Web Development is creating websites and web applications. It involves HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and backend languages!
general_knowledge.database: A Database is an organized collection of data stored on computers. It's essential for managing information!
general_knowledge.cloud computing: Cloud Computing means using remote servers to store and process data instead of local computers. It's scalable and convenient!

education.how to learn ai: Start with basics like Python and math, then explore machine learning libraries. Practice projects and join communities!
education.best way to learn programming: Practice consistently! Build projects, read code, join communities, and never stop learning!
education.any tips: Here are my tips: Be curious, practice regularly, start small, build projects, and don't give up! You've got this!
